page.title: 02HOUSING IN CAREW AREA,TENBY.
page.content: In recent years there has been much growth and development of housing in this area.Three housing phases have been planned.One estate has been completed,two are still in the planning stage.There is also a{council {estate}in the area consisting of{46 {houses,}many now privately owned. Most people in the area own their house.Our survey suggests that only about{19%}of{houses are rented,}of these{approx.14%}are{council houses. Most of the houses were built after 1960.There are{approx.37 bungalows,28 {detached houses,39 semi_detached,1 {hotel,1 guest house}and{5 farmhouses. As far as future housing development is concerned any nearby industrial or commercial development could be significant if this became a{dormitory {area}for e.g.the{Pembroke Dock}area.
